text:
Problems in using log4j(1.2.6) with Tomcat 4.1.18.
The problem I am facing here is that if I set the threshold to "ALL" or "DEBUG" 
then the messages are *not* being logged. Only messages for "INFO" and lower 
level threshold are being logged.

Although it works fine with Tomcat4.0.3.
creator: padmajas22@yahoo.com

text:
This question pops up quite regularly. See
http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?t=104497294500002&r=1&w=2

and in particular

http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=log4j-user&m=104498017406236&w=2

The problem has been reported as bug #13201 to commons-logging.
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=13201

I am marking this bug report as duplicate of 13201.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 13201 ***
creator: ceki@apache.org

text: Changed resolution to INVALID since duplicate bug has been deleted from Bugzilla and leaving as DUPLICATE creates referential integrity issues for the underlying database.
creator: markt@apache.org
